Event.PageTitle: A Bharatanatyam Workshop | Kalasagara UK & ENCEE Academy of Performing Arts
Event.MetaDescription: A Bharatanatyam workshop from Kalasagara UK & ENCEE Academy of Performing Arts on Sunday 26th June 2011.
Event.Address: Patidar House, 22 London Road, Wembley, HA9 7EX
Event.Maindescription:
A Bharatanatyam workshop Conducted by Usha Raghavan for the benefit of aspiring students, dancers and art lovers.

The workshop will be held as below in three different levels:

  • 3 - 4pm - "Introduction to Bharatanatyam" - Complete beginners
  • 4 - 5pm - "Understanding Bharatanatyam" - Students with some training
  • 5 - 6 pm - "Abhinaya - expressions in Bharatanatyam" â€“ Senior dancers (minimum 6 years experience) & performing artists

Register by e-mail / telephone giving details of age & experience
Email: u_raghavan@yahoo.com
Tel: 07899 844869

Closing date for registration: 20th June. Admission will be on first-come-first-served basis.

For more information please visit www.usharaghavan.com
